Thinking back to the tricks that your step-brother, Scott, was playing with your clothing, you wonder if he and Tony are trying to mess with your mind. Could either of them know about your interest in guys?

It would be like those two homophobes to try to pick on you in new and creative ways. At least you’re big, strong, and keep fit. When you were smaller -younger- and your Mom wasn’t around to protect you, Scott made your life miserable. But, when you reached sixteen, you blossomed and got huge.

It wouldn’t surprise you that both those assholes had decided to try something new -something psychological- to torment you … especially if they’d found out about your orientation.

You pull up outside “After Dark” and get out of your car. The curb makes you sumble over your loose pants and you curse as you drop your quarters on the ground.

“Hey, fellah; I got it,” a guy says, walking up.

He’s cute, boyish looks and probably only just eighteen, but he plugs the meter for you with several quarters and winks. You smile gratefully in return.

“Thanks,” you say.

“Any time, little fellah,” he replies.

Before you can ask him what he means, he walks off.

He did seem rather tall (rather big in all ways actually) so that probably explains it.

You feel suddenly a bit dizzy and lean against your car’s door to steady yourself. You feel the car sliding up against your back and your clothes start feeling heavy and binding. What the hell was going on? You look around for Jason, but your friend is nowhere nearby yet. You’ve parked around the corner from “After Dark” but you can hear the thumping bass from here. The line of usuals was probably already queueing up in front. You decide to see if you can slip in the back.

Heading down the alley past the trash bin, you get to the dimly-lit back door to the club and notice just how weird everything looks.

The doorknob is chest-height and the door looks huge! Your dizziness hasn’t worn off as you stumble forward, your normally tight-fitting shorts falling down around your ankles. Only the elastic band of your underwear keeps them from falling off and embarrassing you, further.

“What th’ fuck...?”

You try to steady yourself but the world will have none of that.

Stumbling away from the door, you realize that the world is getting … bigger!
1542.title: After Dark

15422.content: Your knees hit the ground and you barely caught yourself on your arms before your chin met a similar faith. The dizziness was finally wearing off, but your boxers were slipping off now. How tall are you now?
15422.title: As you dwindle, the cute guy from the parking m...

154221.content:
"Not exactly what I meant when I called you little," a voice surprised you enough to jerk around. The dizziness came back for a second before you look at the cute guy from a couple minutes ago. He looked concerned. "Sorry, are you alright?" he asked, offering a large hand to help you up. You took it, using your other hand to keep your modesty.

"Define alright," you slowly answered, glancing back at your pile of clothes. You felt a slight pressure on your shoulders. The cute guy just took his jacket off and was wrapping you up in it. Your hands were completely covered and it hung almost to your ankles, but it was warm compared to the chill of the night.

"You meeting a friend or anything?" he asked.

"Yeah, we were going to meet at the bar-"

"You are over 21!" He looked crestfallen at that.

"I'm not," you tell him. "I'm only 20... fake id," you explained, catching the hope flare up in his eyes.

"Oh shit, sorry. I'm Nick," he quickly introduced himself.

"Tom," you replied.

There was a short pause before Nick spoke again. "Want to find Jason or...?"
154221.title: 1 foot tall

154222.content: "Woah, are you alright?" someone said behind you. Then a warm hand was scooping you up. You are small enough to be held easily.
154222.title: Smaller

1542222.content: You turned around to look at the man. It was that cute guy from the parking meter and he was massive. Seriously how tall are you?
1542222.title: Smaller

info.brief_description: A story about the advertures of a tiny man at the hands of some unsavory characters.
info.description:
A 20 year old man is shrunk and at the hands and mercy of his Step-Father and Step-Brother.

The main character is not only small but can be pliable as well. He can be sujected to anything the writer wants.

This is a macrophile story and only should only involve male/male interaction.
